__e: As she did it, I felt freezing cold and then this impossible sadness.
Everybody said I was gonna lose, and people were saying I was cold and that I was unrelatable.
You stood too much in the cold and also have a concussion so take it easy.
Riddle me with bullets, so you can go home, drink an ice-cold beer, and feel better about yourselves!
There's nothing better in this world than the first sip of an ice cold beer after a long day.
But a cold-blooded killer you are not.

Covering her tracks, trying to go underground, like the vicious, cold-hearted murdering mean girl that she is.
